channel.title: How do i
channel.description:
add ::switch 1 for ancients ::switch 2 for lunars anyone know how i add this
317

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:4, topic:370001”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=466116.msg3408884#msg3408884 date=1290530021]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch") {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
sM("You switch too....");
} 
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch2") {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
sM("you switch too ....");
}

[/quote]
First one needs to be switch1, and an else if block would be more efficient than a new if statement.[/quote]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch1") {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
sM("You switch too....");
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch2") {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
sM("you switch too ....");
}

Read full topic
